title: Haldi Ceremony (Invitation Only)
description: Traditional turmeric ceremony with music and rituals. The Henna and Mendi events will not have a change of attire between them, please dress for the full duration.
attire: Clothes that can get stained, comfortable footwear.

title: Mehndi Ceremony (Invitation Only)
description: Traditional henna art ceremony with music and refreshments. The Henna and Mendi events will not have a change of attire between them, please dress for the full duration.

title: Sehrabandi - (Groom Side Only)
description: Traditional Sehrabandi ceremony at the groom's residence. Attire examples can be found on the FAQ page.

title: Baraat Departure - (Groom Side Only)
description: Groom's procession departure from the groom's residence. Attire examples can be found on the FAQ page.

title: Wedding Ceremony
description: Traditional Hindu wedding ceremony with rituals and prayers Attire examples can be found on the FAQ page.
location: The River Center at Saluda Shoals

title: Cocktail Hour
description: Cocktails and appetizers before the reception.
location: The River Center at Saluda Shoals

title: Wedding Reception
description: Dinner, dancing, and celebration, Attire examples can be found on the FAQ page.
location: The River Center at Saluda Shoals
